xlib_symbol.description: xMenu1B Object Prototype. A variation on xMenu1A. The menu requires a click to close and opening one closes any others that were open.

par.name: openTriggerId
par.note: id string of element which shows menu

par.name: closeTriggerId
par.note: id string of element which closes menu

par.name: slideTime
par.note: integer time for menu slide (in milliseconds)

par.name: bOnClick
par.note: if true menu will open on click, else on mouseover

demo.note: simple menus with plenty of potential
